item.title: How i add... `?
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

to add bank go into client.java and search for makeglobalobject and the first 2 are coordinates and the 3rd is object id and the next one is direction and idk what the last one is but keep it at 10…

you dont need cart

idk for steal

house you need objects to do same as the bank…

npc go onto autospawn.cfg and make a npc spawn where you want it

to make the npc be a shop go into shop.cfg and look at the bottom if the id is like 65 then add a line thats 66 and go into client.java and search for wanneshop = 65 copy that line and paste it right under change the 65 to 66 and change the npc to your npc and to make a guard talking go into npchandler.java and search for a npc that does talk and then copy it and change what it says and the id of the npc[br][br][size=1]Posted on: 21 September 2008, 10:16:22[/size][hr]and idk how to add bumps

Read full topic
